title: Dead Heat
synopsis: Failed driver Makoto is ready to quit the business until he is approached by Hayami Go, who offers him a hyper-engine to change his fortunes. Claiming to be "Japan's first 3D anime," this curio using the VHD-3D system features 21st-century youngsters racing "FX" machines - predictable crosses between motorcycles and mechas.
voices: ['Yao, Kazuki', 'Sakurai, Toshiharu', 'Ogata, Kenichi', 'Ootsuka, Houchuu', 'Katsuki, Masako', 'Oobayashi, Ryuusuke', 'Honda, Chieko', 'Sogabe, Kazuyuki']
staff: [['Kawase, Toshifumi', ['Director']], ['Chiba, Kouichi', ['Sound Director']], ['Ikeda, Shigemi', ['Art Director']], ['Gotou, Masami', ['In-Between Animation']]]
